description:
After suffering an injury through no fault of your own, you may already be feeling uncertain about whom you can trust. I, Brett Osborne of the law firm of Brett Osborne, in Indianapolis, am willing to work hard to win your trust and help you fight for the results you need to move forward with your life. For over 28 years, I have served the legal needs of those in my native Indiana who were struggling with the aftermath of the following and many other situations:

  • Motor vehicle and pedestrian accidents
  • Trucking and other commercial vehicle accidents
  • Construction accidents and other workplace injuries
  • Medical malpractice, including birth injuries
  • Nursing home abuse
  • Premises liability claims, including slip-and-fall accidents, animal bites and toxic mold illnesses
  • Brain and spinal cord injuries
  • Defective products

I can also use the full resources of our law firm to assist you with a wrongful death claim and the complex matters involved in seeking the compensation you deserve following the loss of a loved one. These claims often involve damages that go beyond medical and funeral bills, and I have extensive experience in maximizing the outcomes of wrongful death and other personal injury claims.

Having spent my entire life as a Hoosier, I am proud to stand beside my neighbors in their times of need to help them meet their goals and restore their peace of mind. Contact me at Brett Osborne, in northeast Marion County, to see how I can assist you. For your safety, our law firm offers free consultations by phone, email or video, but you can be assured that we are proactive about protecting your health and safety if you choose to meet with us in person.
